title: All higher curvature gravities can be bootstrapped from their linearizations
abstract:
We show that the full covariant versions of higher curvature order gravities,
like that of GR itself, can be derived by self-coupling from their linear, flat
space, versions. Separately, we comment on the initial version of the
bootstrap.
